text: The Alexander Dennis Enviro500 is a 3-axle double-decker chassis or body of a bus. It has a low-floor. It was built from 2002 to 2014 by Alexander Dennis. The Volvo B9TL bodywork could be built on the Enviro500 chassis. The front of the Enviro500 looks nearly the same as the single-deck Enviro300. In 2015, the Enviro500 was replaced by the Enviro500 MMC.
